name: static
description: Static website builder built on postcss and metalsmith.

scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdirp dist && npm run build:css && npm run build:html
scripts.start: npm run clean && mkdirp dist && concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:html" "npm run start:browsersync"
scripts.watch:html: nodemon --ext hbs --exec "npm run build:html" --watch app/pages --watch app/views

author: Coffee and Code <info@coffeeandcode.com>
